# remove(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the indexes in an index set from the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func remove(_ indexSet: IndexSet)
```

## Parameters

- **indexSet**: Index set to remove.

## Removing Indexes

- **remove(_:)**: Removes an index from the receiver.
- **removeAllIndexes()**: Removes the receiver’s indexes.
- **remove(in:)**: Removes the indexes in an index range from the receiver.
